amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for enforcement of Davis-Bacon wage-rate requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to administer the wage-rate requirements of subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code (Davis-Bacon Act), with respect to any project or program funded by this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 235 (Roll no. 486).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 235 (Roll no. 486).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. King (IA).
